gen:link.msg:message: `ReceivablesOtherCurrent` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ReceivablesOtherCurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ReceivablesOtherCurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfReceivablesOtherCurrentDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfReceivablesOtherCurrentDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfReceivablesOtherCurrentCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfReceivablesOtherCurrentCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Receivables` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_Receivables')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_Receivables return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfReceivablesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfReceivablesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfReceivablesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfReceivablesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
